Text: Alright mate, did you see my response to your question? what encoder did you go with in the end? :)

Did what you said with 3x0, I'm only publishing the larger ones because they are already on the seedbox. 
Future torrent will come out somewhat smaller, thanks for your help and adviceamd 3x0, I just finished encoding one and it comes out at 336mb and works fine with apple tv , ipod & PSP

Once again thanks mate..
And respect to 3xO, he is the man!!

Nice one, you're welcome. Yep, I agree about 3xO, a shame he stopped uploading. Have you joined Suprbay yet? It has lots of info you might find useful. https://forum.suprbay.org/member.php?action=register&referrer=247839
